Description: At Canton Music we don't send out an instrument that's been sitting in a warehouse for months, we send you the EXACT instrument that you see pictured. Before shipping out any instrument, we make sure it gets the approval of our in house tech, Dr. Bones. In addition to Dr. Bones' 12-Point inspection, he'll often write his own review of the instrument and we'll feature it in the description. JUST IN ON TRADE! Gibson Les Paul Studio Tribute in the classic Gold Top w/ HSC Plays great, classic sounds, low action and fast neck! Just a few light wear marks, of which are pictured and in expected areas. Please thoroughly look through all of the pictures. We're always happy to send more pictures and answer all questions upon request. Les Paul Studio Tribute: A Tribute To the Master and the Model The Les Paul Studio Tribute captures the vibe, feel and tonality of a traditional Les Paul. No weight relief Mah-Body, neck and plain Maple top, give it the traditional Gibson Les Paul feel and sound. A true pleasure to play. Covered 498T humbucking bridge pickup and classic 490R Neck pickup, give this the crunchy classic warm clean vibe tone that you've heard on all of your favorite recordings! The Les Paul Tribute captures the historic character of the legendary Les Paul guitar. Historic Gibson tonewoods, carved top, cream pickguard, vintage-style tuners, trapezoid inlays, and boosted PAF-inspired pickups give this impressive guitar classic looks and sound with an elegant, vintage touch. No weight relief for those players who like to feel the authenticity of history in their hands. -Epiphone Hard Shell Case Pictured IS Included - Not Considered "Original Hard Shell Case" For your protection all orders over $99 will be shipped signature required.
Title: Gibson 2018 Les Paul Tribute Studio Gold Top Electric Guitar USA Made w/ HSC
